New Records: Angola converted a penalty to secure a draw after being trailing early in the match
Key Match Events: Algeria scored first in the 18th minute with a goal by Baghdad Bounedjah
Angola equalized in the 65th minute via a penalty conversion by Nabil Bentaleb
Post-Match Reflections: Angola's defensive effort and teamwork were praised despite being a lower-ranked team
Riyad Mahrez's poor performance and frustration were noted by fans and analysts
